demos.name: MatTuGames
demos.description: The game theoretical Matlab toolbox MatTuGames provides about 400 functions for modeling, and calculating some solutions as well as properties of cooperative games with transferable utilities. In contrast to existing Matlab toolboxes to investigate TU-games, which are written in a C/C++ programming style with the consequence that these functions are executed relatively slowly, we heavily relied on vectorized constructs in order to write more efficient Matlab functions.
